text: Quick assist w/ finding Javascript variable (PollDaddy hash)
I'm working on finding a variable for a PollDaddy poll.
The API says that the hash is attributed to the variable PDV_h[PollID] (check "Voting" part of API).
I've been looking all around this poll here but can't seem to find it.
Can anyone help me figure out the hash and tell me how you were able to find it?
